name: Invigorating Repose
text: This spell enhances your spells that bring the dead back to life. If you cast raise dead, the target creature is restored to full hit points. If you cast breath of life, that spell can revive a dead target as long as you cast it within a number of rounds equal to half your caster level, and the healing effect is treated as if the spell were empowered with the Empower Spell feat. Casting any of these spells discharges the invigorating repose spell.
duration_zh: 1小时 或 直至能量发散
text_zh: 这种法术会强化你的复活法术。如果你施展死者复活（raise dead），目标生物将会满生命值的复活。如果你施展生命之息（breath of life），你能复活一个在轮数等于你施法者等级一半的时间之前死亡的目标，治疗效果会如同这种法术被法术强效专长（Empower Spell feat）加持过。施展任何这些法术都会耗尽活力安息法术的能量。
